name: Heme Retic
title: Hematopoietic, Reticuloendothelial, Immunoproliferative, and Myeloproliferative Neoplasms
notes:
**Note 1:** TNM is not defined for this schema. If directly assigning Summary Stage 2000 (SS2000), use the *Hematopoietic, Reticuloendothelial, Immunoproliferative, and Myeloproliferative Neoplasms* chapter on page 286 of the [SS2000 on-line manual](https://seer.cancer.gov/tools/ssm/ssm2000/SSSM2000-122012.pdf#page=286).

**Note 2:** M-See list of specific histologies below, effective for cases diagnosed 2010 and forward.  All primary sites (C000-C809) are included unless otherwise specified. 

**Note 3:** Schema includes the preferred terms based on the *2008 WHO Classification of Haematopoietic and Lymphoid Tissues*

9740     Mast cell sarcoma
9741     Malignant mastocytosis
9742     Mast cell leukemia
9751     Langerhans cell histiocytosis, NOS
9755     Histiocytic sarcoma
9756     Langerhans cell sarcoma
9757     Interdigitating dendritic cell sarcoma

inputs.name: JAK2 (also known as Janus Kinase 2 and JAK2 Exon 12)
